thread.title: What is Innovate in Brasil about?
thread.title_full: What is Innovate in Brasil about? - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: What is Innovate in Brasil about?
text: Find out more about Innovate in Brasil » Innovate in Brasil will focus on successful, real-world R&D projects from international companies active in Brazil, demonstrating the impact of successful innovation on the bottom line. Delegates will have a chance to learn about successful strategies to acquire and retain outstanding local talent as well as the benefits of collaboration and partnerships with internal teams and external organisations. The Brazilian government’s commitment to supporting R&D and innovation will be highlighted, as well as the gains that can be made from partnering with universities and academic organisations. The education infrastructure in Brazil and the investment being made in developing local talent will also be discussed. There is a growing momentum of business innovation across the globe, not least because of new technologies and the ubiquity of ICT. This conference is about harnessing the latest technologies to catapult businesses into their next phase of growth. Innovate in Brasil is an invitation only conference. To make an inquiry please email Soosyan.Eng@telegraph.co.uk
